messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happy Anniversary!
messages.msgSnippet: ... Indeed! You might even consider elevating it to an art form. There s probably an NEA grant out there you d qualify for...might pay to check. Heidi
messages.messageBody:
>Sandra the whiner...***
>
>I hardly think it's whining to be sick of pain and immobility!

Indeed!
You might even consider elevating it to an art form.
There's probably an NEA grant out there you'd qualify for...might pay to check.
Heidi

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Happy Anniversary!
messages.msgSnippet: ... list. ***It must have been three years, because I feel like I ve been on the couch with a broken leg for a year. That s a joke, but unfortunately not a
messages.messageBody:
>>Tomorrow November 23 marks the one year anniversary of this wonderful
list.

***It must have been three years, because I feel like I've been on the
couch
with a broken leg for a year.

That's a joke, but unfortunately not a funny one.

Sandra the whiner...***

I hardly think it's whining to be sick of pain and immobility!
If you thought it was ok to be hurting and stuck and miserable I'd think
there was something wrong with you. I hope the next few days and weeks
bring you huge progress and relief.

Deb L
